name: morpho-vaults-ops
description: Operational scripts for Morpho Vaults demo

scriptshelp.ops:deploy:tokens: Deploys mock ERC20 tokens (e.g., fakeUSD, fakeTIA) for the sandbox.
scriptshelp.ops:deploy:aggregator: Deploys a settable Chainlink-compatible aggregator for oracle price mocking.
scriptshelp.ops:deploy:oracle: Deploys a self-deployed oracle that reads from the mock aggregator.
scriptshelp.ops:build:oracle: Builds an oracle using Morpho's ChainlinkOracleV2Factory (alternative to self-deployed).
scriptshelp.ops:create:market: Creates a sandbox Morpho Blue market with deployed tokens and oracle.
scriptshelp.ops:mint:tokens: Mints mock ERC20 tokens to the configured wallet addresses via faucet.
scriptshelp.ops:init:util: Initializes market utilization by supplying collateral and borrowing.
